</style>

Provides a Redshift event subscription resource.

## Attributes

The following additional atttributes are provided:

* `arn` - Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Redshift event notification subscription
* `id` - The name of the Redshift event notification subscription
* `customer_aws_id` - The AWS customer account associated with the Redshift event notification subscription

> This content is derived from https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-aws/blob/master/website/docs/r/redshift_event_subscription.html.markdown.

The following arguments are supported:

<table class="ml-6">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Argument</th>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">enabled</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>boolean</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) A boolean flag to enable/disable the subscription. Defaults to true.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">event<wbr>Categories</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>Array&lt;<wbr>string<wbr>&gt;</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) A list of event categories for a SourceType that you want to subscribe to. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/redshift/latest/mgmt/working-with-event-notifications.html or run `aws redshift describe-event-categories`.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">name</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>string</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) The name of the Redshift event subscription.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">severity</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>string</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) The event severity to be published by the notification subscription. Valid options are `INFO` or `ERROR`.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">sns<wbr>Topic<wbr>Arn</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>string</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Required) The ARN of the SNS topic to send events to.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">source<wbr>Ids</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>Array&lt;<wbr>string<wbr>&gt;</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) A list of identifiers of the event sources for which events will be returned. If not specified, then all sources are included in the response. If specified, a source_type must also be specified.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">source<wbr>Type</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>string</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) The type of source that will be generating the events. Valid options are `cluster`, `cluster-parameter-group`, `cluster-security-group`, or `cluster-snapshot`. If not set, all sources will be subscribed to.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td class="align-top">tags</td>
            <td class="align-top"><code>Map&lt;<wbr>any<wbr>&gt;</code></td>
            <td class="align-top">{{% md %}}
(Optional) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

{{% /md %}}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
